mean_en: to change direction or make something change direction, especially after hitting something; to succeed in preventing something from being directed towards you; to prevent somebody from doing something that they are determined to do
sentence: He managed to deflect the arrow so it pointed upward.
sentence_trans: 他尝试着使箭头偏斜，这样它就指向上方。
word_etyma: de偏离 + flect弯曲 → 偏离弯曲 → 偏斜
